about_the_game:
Our hero awoke one day as a werewolf with no memories of his past and understanding of the world he lives in.


Features

. Story driven game divided into 10 chapters as a tale that will unfold his dramatic scenario through handmade pixel art story board as the player will progress into the world of Aurora. Learn about the torturous past of the Wolf Knight and why the world of Aurora is at war for 1,000 years.


. Challenging die and retry gameplay that will test your skills through wide range of challenges and enemies: armed knight, troll firing bombs, avoid arrow, destroy stone boulders, moving platforms...


. Hand drawned 2D pixel art graphics environment that will take you from a sunset plains, a dark cave, a magical forest, snowing mountains and many others and make you discovers all the species, tribes and people of Aurora.


. Unique melodious musics that will immerse you composed by very talented artist

. Learn new abilities each time you defeat a boss to be able to explore inaccessible areas of the map. Learn double jump to reach far moving platforms, dash to avoid falling obstacles, grapple to reach inaccessible areas, become a wolf to sneak out in hidden places and learn other abilities…


. Collect coins and gems that are spread in challenging location to push even further your skills.


. Use a map to travel in the wide interconnected world, and don’t hesitate to backtracking to progress in the adventure


. Retro Game with modern gameplay

short_description: Take command of the Wolf Knight to help him remember his dramatic past life through a story driven adventure and test your skills in this challenging Metroidvania game with die and retry platforming features happening in the fantastic 2D hand drawned world of Aurora.
